content: Quick Entry before going to sleep after about 8 hours of developing for the #MeatlyJam.
Step 1: Plan ahead. Don't start programming all willy-nilly, you will be sad later on when classes aren't interacting quite as you would have envisioned.
Step 2: While planning actually consider the game play not the story behind the game.
Step 3: Hope Imagination Land gives you something good.
Imagination Land, where good game ideas are always right in front of you
